title: Investigate Missing Scaffolding Tag
description: A safety officer notices a scaffold that is missing its inspection tag (green or red). They must investigate its safety status.

tasks.description: Immediately restrict access to the untagged scaffold.
tasks.expected_outcome: The area around the scaffold is cordoned off.

tasks.description: Locate the competent person responsible for scaffolding inspections on site.
Request an immediate inspection of the scaffold and proper tagging before allowing use.
tasks.expected_outcome: A competent person inspects the scaffold and applies the correct safety tag.
